text: ...I, I can't do it at all~~~!!

I didn't think cool
would be this difficult...!

Yeah, it seems like everyone has their own challenges.
But... Mamimi's finish is indeed remarkable.

Um, sorry...
I... I can't keep up...

─No, I'm sorry.
I didn't mean to blame Kiriko for anything.

Expressing the world of this song
seems even more challenging than I imagined.

That's right.
From formations to expressions... it's quite difficult.

…………
...Was it really, the right choice to go with Gothic...?

...That's because,
we all decided to do it that way.
I don't think that's the issue though...

Yeah, now that we've found the challenges,
we have to approach them with all our might.
